src:
Live Streaming Aston Villa vs Liverpool di Mola TV
02 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemimpin klasemen Liverpool akan menantang melawan tim promosi dan peringkat 15 Aston Villa pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Pertandingan tersebut disiarkan langsung di TVRI dan live streaming di Mola TV, dengan kick-off pukul 22:00 WIB.
Di Carabao Cup menjamu Arsenal tengah pekan kemarin, Liverpool memainkan thriller sepuluh gol, kemudian menang adu penalti. James Milner, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, dan Divock Origi mencetak gol untuk Liverpool.
Di lain pihak, Aston Villa sukses menyingkirkan Wolverhampton. Aston Villa lolos berkat kemenangan 2-1 di Villa Park lewat gol-gol Anwar El Ghazi dan Ahmed Elmohamady.
Pekan lalu, Aston Villa bermain impresif di babak pertama melawan tuan rumah Manchester City. Namun, pasukan Dean Smith lengah dan kebobolan tiga gol setelah jeda.
Sementara itu, Liverpool telah melalui lima laga di Premier League sejak terakhir kali mereka menang dengan margin lebih dari satu gol. Dengan komposisi pemain yang lebih baik, The Reds berpeluang mengubahnya.
text:
Live Streaming of Aston Villa vs Liverpool on Mola TV
02 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool league leaders will challenge the promotion team and ranked 15th Aston Villa in the 11th week of the 2019/20 Premier League, Saturday (11/02/2019). The match was broadcast live on TVRI and live streaming on Mola TV, with kick-off at 22:00 WIB.
At Carabao Cup entertaining Arsenal midweek yesterday, Liverpool played a ten-goal thriller, then won on penalties. James Milner, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and Divock Origi scored for Liverpool.
On the other hand, Aston Villa successfully got rid of Wolverhampton. Aston Villa escaped thanks to a 2-1 win at Villa Park with goals from Anwar El Ghazi and Ahmed Elmohamady.
Last week, Aston Villa played impressive in the first round against host Manchester City. However, Dean Smith's troops let their guard down and conceded three goals after the break.
Meanwhile, Liverpool have gone through five matches in the Premier League since the last time they won by a margin of more than one goal. With a better composition of players, the Reds have the opportunity to change it.
